statements: SELECT * FROM InventoryAudit
SELECT product_name, physical_count FROM InventoryAudit WHERE location = 'Warehouse A'
SELECT product_name, physical_count, database_count FROM InventoryAudit ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT location, product_name, physical_count FROM InventoryAudit WHERE physical_count > database_count
SELECT id, location, product_id, product_name, physical_count, database_count FROM InventoryAudit
SELECT id, location, product_name, physical_count FROM InventoryAudit WHERE physical_count > database_count ORDER BY location ASC, product_id DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT location, SUM(physical_count) AS total_physical_count, SUM(database_count) AS total_database_count FROM InventoryAudit GROUP BY location HAVING total_physical_count > total_database_count ORDER BY total_physical_count DESC
SELECT * FROM InventoryAudit WHERE product_name LIKE '%apple%' OR product_name LIKE '%banana%' ORDER BY location DESC
SELECT id, product_name, physical_count - database_count AS count_difference FROM InventoryAudit WHERE physical_count != database_count ORDER BY count_difference ASC, product_name ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT product_id, MAX(physical_count) AS max_count, MIN(database_count) AS min_count FROM InventoryAudit GROUP BY product_id HAVING max_count > 100 AND min_count < 50 ORDER BY product_id ASC
SELECT * FROM inventory_audit;
SELECT item_id, quantity FROM inventory_audit WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT item_name, quantity, timestamp FROM inventory_audit ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT item_id, item_name FROM inventory_audit;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM inventory_audit;
SELECT * FROM inventory_audit WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY date_added DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT product_name, quantity, price FROM inventory_audit WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY quantity ASC
SELECT DISTINCT product_name FROM inventory_audit WHERE quantity IS NOT NULL ORDER BY product_name
SELECT * FROM inventory_audit WHERE quantity BETWEEN 5 AND 15 ORDER BY quantity DESC, date_added ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT AVG(price) AS average_price, MAX(quantity) AS max_quantity FROM inventory_audit WHERE date_added > '2021-01-01'
SELECT * FROM inventory_audit;
SELECT audit_id, physical_count, database_count FROM inventory_audit;
SELECT product_id, product_name, unit_price FROM product ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT product_name, category FROM product WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT audit_id, physical_count, database_count FROM inventory_audit WHERE physical_count < database_count;
SELECT * FROM inventory_audit WHERE physical_count > 100 AND database_count < 150;
SELECT product_name, category FROM product WHERE unit_price < 50.00 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT physical_count, database_count FROM inventory_audit WHERE physical_count != database_count;
SELECT a.audit_id, p.product_name, ad.discrepancy_reason FROM audit_discrepancy ad JOIN inventory_audit a ON ad.audit_id = a.audit_id JOIN product p ON ad.product_id = p.product_id;

SELECT p.product_name, a.physical_count, a.database_count, ad.discrepancy_reason FROM audit_discrepancy ad JOIN inventory_audit a ON ad.audit_id = a.audit_id JOIN product p ON ad.product_id = p.product_id WHERE physical_count < database_count;
SELECT * FROM InventoryCounts ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT product_name, physical_count FROM InventoryCounts WHERE physical_count > 10;
SELECT id, product_name, timestamp FROM Discrepancies WHERE physical_count <> database_count;
SELECT * FROM DatabaseRecords ORDER BY database_count ASC;
SELECT id, audit_type, timestamp FROM AuditLog WHERE audit_type='inventory';
SELECT * FROM InventoryCounts WHERE physical_count > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT product_name, physical_count FROM InventoryCounts WHERE physical_count < 50 ORDER BY physical_count ASC;
SELECT product_name, physical_count, database_count FROM Discrepancies WHERE physical_count != database_count ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT Count(*) AS Total_Discrepancies FROM Discrepancies;
SELECT product_name, description FROM AuditLog WHERE audit_type = 'Error' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_audit;
SELECT product_name, quantity, unit_price FROM product WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT employee_name, role FROM employee WHERE role = 'Manager';
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity FROM product WHERE quantity BETWEEN 5 AND 10;
SELECT location_id, location_name FROM location WHERE inventory_status = 'Active' ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_audit WHERE physical_count > 100;
SELECT product_name, quantity, unit_price FROM product WHERE quantity < 50 ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT employee_name, role FROM employee WHERE role = 'Manager';
SELECT discrepancy_id, audit_id, product_id FROM discrepancy WHERE reason LIKE '%missing%';
SELECT location_name, inventory_status FROM location WHERE inventory_status = 'Good' ORDER BY location_name ASC;
